name: Dash & Popy versus The Goblins
description:
/!\ WARNING : LOCAL 2 PLAYERS ONLY /!\

Dash & Popy is an arcade game where you must survive goblins assaults.

One player uses a mouse and the other uses an Xbox Controller or a keyboard.

If the game has some success, we may update it ;)

This is the post-jam version of the game, which was created in 48h for GGJ 2015.

#GGJ2015

http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/dash-popy-versus-goblins

Protips : - The laser can kill red/blue goblins but the force field cannot

- If you dash while using the laser you can kill a lot of goblins

- Dash must kill goblins around flowers to help Popy to collect them
